cosmos.question: I am big and yellow and shine so bright, I give you warmth and fill the day with light. What am I?
I'm round and blue and green, a place you've surely seen. You live here, it's your home, where you can run and roam. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 Plants and trees grow on me
🏠 I am where your house is

cosmos.question: I come out at night, I’m white and round and bright. Sometimes I'm a crescent, a sliver of light. What am I?

hints.text: 🧀 People think I'm made of cheese, but I'm not!

cosmos.question: I am a hot, giant ball of gas, far, far away. I twinkle in the night. What am I?

hints.text: 🔭 I look small, but I am very big

cosmos.question: I am a ball of rock and ice that zooms around the sun. I have a tail when I get close. What am I?

hints.text: ☄️ Sometimes people think I am a shooting star
💨 I have a long tail made of gas and dust

cosmos.question: I am a group of stars that make a picture in the sky, like a bear or a hunter. What am I?

hints.text: 🐻 Ursa Major is one of me
🌌 You can find me in a star chart

cosmos.question: I am a big group of stars, gas, and dust, all held together. Our sun is one of many inside me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌀 I am like a giant spiral
🌌 We live in the Milky Way
🔭 I am bigger than a constellation

cosmos.question: I am a place where astronauts fly. I go around the Earth. What am I?

hints.text: 👩‍🚀 People in me wear special suits.

cosmos.question: I'm red and dusty, and sometimes people think there are aliens living on me. What planet am I?

hints.text: 🚀 People are trying to visit me
🍫 I am named after a Roman god of war
🔴 I am called the Red Planet

cosmos.question: I spin around the Sun with all my friends. You can live on me, and I am not the Sun. What am I?

hints.text: 🌞 I am part of a solar system

ocean.question: I swim in the sea and I'm very colorful. What am I?

hints.text: 🐠 I have fins and a tail
🌈 I can be orange, blue, or yellow

ocean.question: I'm big and blue and hold lots of water. What am I?

hints.text: 🐳 Whales and dolphins live in me

ocean.question: I'm a home made of sand, built on the beach. What am I?

hints.text: 🪣 You can make me with a bucket and shovel

ocean.question: I have eight arms and live in the sea. What am I?
I can walk sideways on the beach, and I have a hard shell. What am I?
I'm very big and I sing a song. What am I?

hints.text: 🐋 I'm the biggest animal in the ocean
🌊 I blow water out of a hole on my head

ocean.question: I have a pointy shell and live in the sea. If you hold me to your ear, you can 'hear' the ocean.

hints.text: 🐚 I'm a pretty treasure found on the beach

ocean.question: I'm a big fish with sharp teeth and I live in the ocean. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I have a fin on my back
🦷 I have many rows of teeth

ocean.question: I'm a sea creature with five arms that looks like a star. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I live on the ocean floor

ocean.question: I swim in the ocean, but I'm not a fish. I'm a very smart animal that likes to play. What am I?

hints.text: 🐬 I make clicking sounds to talk
⚽ I like to jump and play with balls
